values.definition: We tell clients what they need to hear, not what they want to hear
AI enhances but doesn't replace marketing fundamentals
Measured by outcomes, not effort or deliverables

purpose.mission: Help B2B tech companies grow through strategic marketing that works
purpose.vision: Define the future of AI-augmented B2B marketing

brand.brandPromise: Strategic clarity that drives measurable growth

coreClaims.claim: We combine strategy and execution—most agencies do one or the other
We're years ahead on AI transformation
25+ years of B2B marketing pattern recognition

narrativeFrames.name: Fundamentals + AI
narrativeFrames.before: Choosing between AI hype and traditional marketing
narrativeFrames.after: AI-augmented marketing grounded in what works

elevatorPitches.tenSecond: We help B2B tech companies grow through strategic marketing that combines fundamentals with AI transformation.
elevatorPitches.thirtySecond: The Starr Conspiracy is a strategic marketing partner for B2B tech companies. We combine 25 years of marketing fundamentals with AI leadership to help CMOs build pipeline, differentiate their brand, and navigate transformation—without choosing between strategy and execution.

voiceRules.exampleGood: Most B2B content fails because it's boring.
voiceRules.exampleBad: There are opportunities to enhance content engagement through various optimization strategies.

voiceRules.exampleGood: Here's what you need to know
voiceRules.exampleBad: It is important that organizations understand

voiceRules.exampleGood: AI will eat traditional SEO within 3 years.
voiceRules.exampleBad: In this post, we'll explore the future of SEO.

structuralPatterns.structure: Pain point → Why it exists → Solution → Proof

stylisticMarkers.sentenceLength: Mix short punchy sentences with longer explanatory ones

primary.label: AI Pragmatist (CMO/VP Marketing)
painPoints: Budget pressure + 'do more with less' while hitting growth targets
Proving ROI in messy 200+ touchpoint buying journeys
Standing out in over-saturated tech markets
Lead quality, CAC, and pipeline efficiency challenges
Tech stack sprawl and data quality issues
Adapting to digital-first, self-serve, skeptical buyers
Talent gaps, capacity constraints, and change fatigue
AI governance, privacy, and trust concerns
primary.worldview: Marketing should be a strategic growth engine, not a cost center. AI is an opportunity, not a threat.

jtbd.startingState: Marketing is a cost center with unpredictable results
jtbd.desiredState: Marketing is a predictable pipeline machine with measurable ROI
obstacles: Don't know what good looks like
hiringCriteria: Proven track record with similar companies

jtbd.startingState: Uncertain how AI applies to our marketing
jtbd.desiredState: AI-augmented marketing function with competitive advantage
hiringCriteria: Real AI expertise, not just hype

jtbd.desiredState: Strategic marketing guidance with experienced leadership
obstacles: Don't know what to look for
